segment.source: Investigate Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection alerts
segment.target: Investigate Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection alerts

segment.source: Use the investigation options to get details on which alerts are affecting your network, what they mean, and how to resolve them.
segment.target: Use the investigation options to get details on which alerts are affecting your network, what they mean, and how to resolve them.

segment.source: Investigate Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection alerts
segment.target: Investigate Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection alerts

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later
segment.target: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later

segment.source: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)
segment.target: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)

segment.source: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.
segment.target: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.

segment.source: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]
segment.target: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]

segment.source: Alerts in Windows Defender ATP indicate possible security breaches on endpoints in your organization.
segment.target: Alerts in Windows Defender ATP indicate possible security breaches on endpoints in your organization.

segment.source: There are three alert severity levels, described in the following table.
segment.target: There are three alert severity levels, described in the following table.

segment.source: Alert severity
segment.target: Alert severity

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: High (Red)
segment.target: High (Red)

segment.source: Threats often associated with advanced persistent threats (APT).
segment.target: Threats often associated with advanced persistent threats (APT).

segment.source: These alerts indicate a high risk due to the severity of damage they can inflict on endpoints.
segment.target: These alerts indicate a high risk due to the severity of damage they can inflict on endpoints.

segment.source: Medium (Orange)
segment.target: Medium (Orange)

segment.source: Threats rarely observed in the organization, such as anomalous registry change, execution of suspicious files, and observed behaviors typical of attack stages.
segment.target: Threats rarely observed in the organization, such as anomalous registry change, execution of suspicious files, and observed behaviors typical of attack stages.

segment.source: Low (Yellow)
segment.target: Low (Yellow)

segment.source: Threats associated with prevalent malware and hack-tools that do not appear to indicate an advanced threat targeting the organization.
segment.target: Threats associated with prevalent malware and hack-tools that do not appear to indicate an advanced threat targeting the organization.

segment.source: Reviewing the various alerts and their severity can help you decide on the appropriate action to protect your organization's endpoints.
segment.target: Reviewing the various alerts and their severity can help you decide on the appropriate action to protect your organization's endpoints.

segment.source: Alerts are organized in three queues, by their workflow status:
segment.target: Alerts are organized in three queues, by their workflow status:

segment.source: New
segment.target: New

segment.source: In progress
segment.target: In progress

segment.source: Resolved
segment.target: Resolved

segment.source: To begin investigating, click on an alert in any of the alert queues.
segment.target: To begin investigating, click on an alert in any of the alert queues.

segment.source: Details displayed about the alert include:
segment.target: Details displayed about the alert include:

segment.source: When the alert was last observed
segment.target: When the alert was last observed

segment.source: Alert description
segment.target: Alert description

segment.source: Recommended actions
segment.target: Recommended actions

segment.source: The potential scope of breach
segment.target: The potential scope of breach

segment.source: The indicators that triggered the alert
segment.target: The indicators that triggered the alert

segment.source: A detailed view of an alert when clicked
segment.target: A detailed view of an alert when clicked

segment.source: Alerts attributed to an adversary or actor display a colored tile with the actor name.
segment.target: Alerts attributed to an adversary or actor display a colored tile with the actor name.

segment.source: Click on the actor's name to see a threat intelligence profile of the actor, including a brief overview of the actor, their interests or targets, tools, tactics, and processes (TTPs) as well as areas where it's active worldwide.
segment.target: Click on the actor's name to see a threat intelligence profile of the actor, including a brief overview of the actor, their interests or targets, tools, tactics, and processes (TTPs) as well as areas where it's active worldwide.

segment.source: You will also see a set of recommended actions to take.
segment.target: You will also see a set of recommended actions to take.

segment.source: Some actor profiles include a link to download a more comprehensive threat intelligence report.
segment.target: Some actor profiles include a link to download a more comprehensive threat intelligence report.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: View the Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection Dashboard

segment.source: View and organize the Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection Alerts queue
segment.target: View and organize the Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection Alerts queue

segment.source: Investigate machines in the Windows Defender ATP Machines view
segment.target: Investigate machines in the Windows Defender ATP Machines view

segment.source: Investigate a file associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert
segment.target: Investigate a file associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert

segment.source: Investigate an IP address associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert
segment.target: Investigate an IP address associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert

segment.target: Investigate a domain associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert
